SELECT typeId, SUM(cnt) AS cnt FROM ( SELECT a.content_type_id AS typeId, COUNT(*) * 3 AS cnt FROM plan_relation r JOIN plan p ON p.plan_id = r.plan_id JOIN attraction_info a ON r.attraction_id = a.content_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY a.content_type_id
UNION ALL SELECT a.content_type_id AS typeId, COUNT(*) * 5 AS cnt FROM plan_relation r JOIN plan p ON p.plan_id = r.plan_id LEFT JOIN hotspot_article h ON p.plan_id = h.plan_id JOIN attraction_info a ON r.attraction_id = a.content_id WHERE h.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY a.content_type_id
UNION ALL SELECT a.content_type_id AS typeId, COUNT(*) * 2 AS cnt FROM plan_relation r JOIN plan p ON p.plan_id = r.plan_id LEFT JOIN share_article s ON p.plan_id = s.plan_id JOIN attraction_info a ON r.attraction_id = a.content_id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY a.content_type_id
UNION ALL SELECT a.content_type_id AS typeId, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM plan_relation r JOIN plan p ON p.plan_id = r.plan_id JOIN attraction_info a ON r.attraction_id = a.content_id WHERE p.user_id IN (SELECT following_id FROM follow WHERE follower_id = #{userId}) GROUP BY a.content_type_id
UNION ALL SELECT type_id AS typeId, cnt FROM user_flavor WHERE user_id = #{userId} ) sub GROUP BY typeId ORDER BY cnt DESC;
